title: Os Senhores da Guerra 2
overview: During the Rio Grande do Sul revolution of 1923, two brothers fight on opposite sides.
storyline: Grand filmmaking divided into two feature films: Part I "Step of the Carts" and Part II "Col de la Croix". Based on the book by José Antonio Severo, tells the true story of the brothers Carlos and Julio Bozano, young people of the state elite in the early twentieth century. United by profound friendship, end up facing in opposite sides in the civil war of 1924, in Rio Grande do Sul. Julius, 24, is mayor of Santa Maria, and given a mission to stop the advance of the revolutionary troops of General Zeca Netto. Carlos Bozano, 21, is the private secretary of the rebel leader. The beautiful Maria Clara and the aristocratic Cecilia loves warriors, carry dreams and hopes amidst the turmoil. Fate puts the Communist leader Luiz Carlos Prestes between the two brothers. The surprising outcome of the battle on the Col de la Croix they prove that the Brotherhood is the strongest of flags. Directed by Tabajara Ruas, who signs the script with José Antônio Severo, executive produced by Ligia Walper, ...
synopsis: Grand filmmaking divided into two feature films: Part I "Step of the Carts" and Part II "Col de la Croix". Based on the book by José Antonio Severo, tells the true story of the brothers Carlos and Julio Bozano, young people of the state elite in the early twentieth century. United by profound friendship, end up facing in opposite sides in the civil war of 1924, in Rio Grande do Sul. Julius, 24, is mayor of Santa Maria, and given a mission to stop the advance of the revolutionary troops of General Zeca Netto. Carlos Bozano, 21, is the private secretary of the rebel leader. The beautiful Maria Clara and the aristocratic Cecilia loves warriors, carry dreams and hopes amidst the turmoil. Fate puts the Communist leader Luiz Carlos Prestes between the two brothers. The surprising outcome of the battle on the Col de la Croix they prove that the Brotherhood is the strongest of flags. Directed by Tabajara Ruas, who signs the script with José Antônio Severo, executive produced by Ligia Walper, musical direction Pirisca Grecco, photo Ivo Czamanski and Pablo Escajedo, THE WAR LORDS has the winning team NETTO LOSES HIS SOUL, NETTO AND HORSES tamer and Brizola FIGHT FROM TIME achievement.
